name: Cue ball by points between red
description: Place the cue ball white on the brown spot and one red to  the yellow spot and one red to the green spot. Aiming hit the cue ball over the four spots and back to the between red balls.

name: Six red in pocket
description: Starting from anywhere try to clear all of the balls in any sequence. Play specific position on each shot and keep distance between cue ball and object ball to a minimum. This exercise improves positional play.

name: Cue ball by points
description: Place the cue ball white on the brown spot. Aiming hit the cue ball over the four spots and back to the tip of your cue.

name: Cannon red and white
description: Hit the red ball on the blue spot full in the face sending it off the top cushion and back for a cannon with the white ball. Use a small amount of top spin for this shot.

name: Three red
description: Starting from any position aim to pot a red and gain position on one of the other reds.

name: The first fifteen reds
description: Try to clear all of the reds without missing. Nice and simple routine to warm the cue arm up.

name: Blue potting angles
description: Here are 4 different potting angles on the blue ball. The distance between balls is a ball's width. Pot the reds ball hitting the white just above the centre from each position indicated by the red balls.

name: Black potting angles
description: Here are 4 different potting angles on the black ball. The distance between balls is a ball's width. Pot the reds ball hitting the white just above the centre from each position indicated by the red balls.

name: Pink potting angles
description: Here are 4 different potting angles on the pink ball. The distance between balls is a ball's width. Pot the reds ball hitting the white just above the centre from each position indicated by the red balls.

name: Pink potting angles to middle pocket
description: There are 4 different potting angles on the pink ball. The distance between balls is a ball's width. Pot the red ball hitting the white just above the center from each position indicated by the red ball.

name: Cannon ball run
description: Try to pot blue and cannon into the reds. The purpose of this exercise is to pot the blue ball and then make a cannon with each of the red balls.

name: Pot and position
description: Pot the red ball to middle pocket and position the white ball in colour order as shown. Use top-spin, stun and screw shots to gain position opposite each ball in the line working from yellow down to black.

name: Five reds
description: Starting from any position aim to pot a red and gain position on one of the other reds.

name: Pink to black - top spin
description: Attempt to pot the straight red with follow and control the pace to pot the black into corner pocket.

name: Pink to black - control white
description: Attempt to pot the angled red with stun and control the pace to pot the black into corner pocket.

name: Blue to black - back spin
description: Attempt to pot the angled red with stun and control the pace to pot the black into corner pocket.

name: Black to blue - control white
description: Attempt to pot the angled red with stun and control the pace to pot the blue into the middle pocket.

name: Black to pink - screw shots
description: Attempt to pot the red with screw and control the pace to pot the pink into the corner pocket.

name: Blue to black - stun and control
description: Attempt to pot the angled red with stun and control the pace to pot the black into corner pocket.

name: Brown to pink - screw shots
description: Attempt to pot the angled red with screw and control the pace to pot the pink into corner pocket.

name: Half black ball
description: You play the best of 5 shots from this position shown on the table and play half ball in - off black into pocket.

name: Half blue ball
description: You play the best of 5 shots from this position shown on the table and play half ball in - off red into pocket.

name: Screw and control the cue ball
description: You must attempt to pot the red with screw and control the pace to pot the pink into the corner pocket.

name: Black with white ball
description: You must attempt to pot the straight red with follow and pot the cue ball and red with into the corner pocket.

name: Pink with white ball
description: You must attempt to pot the straight red with follow and pot the cue ball and red with into the corner pocket.
